description:
JavaScript is known as a lightweight scripting programming language used to create interactivity on a webpage.

It works with HTML and CSS hence it helps to have a basic knowledge of HTML and CSS before learning JavaScript.
JavaScript creates the interaction on websites. For example when a visitor goes to a website to complete and submit a form or clicks on a button to 
perform an action.

All you need to start learning JavaScript is plain text editor.  You can place JavaScript inside an HTML document using a script tag <script>  </script> or 
reference it from an external file.

JavaScript is the most popular front end programming language in the world today used to create visible interaction on all websites.
It is used in a variety of places  for example in web development,game development,statistical presentation and more. If you want to be web developer or programmer 
learning JavaScript is a must.

This is a beginners course that will teach you the basics from the syntax to creating arrays. What you will learn includes :

  • Syntax ( How to write JavaScript)
  • Best place for  JavaScript in HTML document
  • Data Types
  • Operators
  • Variables
  • Arrays
  • Conditional statements
  • Functions
  • Changing webpage content
  • Using Comments
  • Events

This course has been designed for the absolute beginner to JavaScript . It is video based and at a pace which is easy enough to follow.

I look forward to seeing you on the course.

Thank You
title: Learn JavaScript from scratch and create interactivity
